lead_paragraph: A Shanghai court ordered two Chinese firms to pay Walt Disney Co and Pixar more than 1.35 million yuan ($194,440) compensation for copying parts of their hit movies "Cars" and "Cars 2", the official Xinhua news agency reported on Saturday.

headline.main: Chinese Firms Ordered to Pay Disney, Pixar $194,000 for Copying 'Cars': Xinhua
headline.print_headline: Chinese Firms Ordered to Pay Disney, Pixar $194,000 for Copying 'Cars': Xinhua

snippet: A Shanghai court ordered two Chinese firms to pay Walt Disney Co and Pixar more than 1.35 million yuan ($194,440) compensation for copying parts of their hit movies "Cars" and "Cars 2", the official Xinhua news agency reported on Saturday....
